question: Which is correct about PSL targets for Foreign banks in India?
option1: It is not applicable on foreign banks
option2: It is applicable on foreign banks having 50 or more branches
option3: It is applicable on foreign banks having 20 or more branches
option4: It is applicable on all foreign banks
answer: It is applicable on foreign banks having 20 or more branches
explanation: The targets under Priority sector Lending are applicable to all the Domestic scheduled commercial banks (excluding Regional Rural Banks and Small Finance Banks) and Foreign banks with 20 branches and above.
